review.title: “Don't work here.”
review.pros: Pros – The boss does not work in the office often, so you do not have him looking over your shoulder every day. If you cannot work independently, this would not be a good environment for you.
review.cons: Cons – They want you to lie to clients, blame you for things that are out of your control, then steal your good ideas and present them as their own. These people are true scheisters!
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – You need to retire.
